website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking thong-styled running wear should check out these seamless panties from Balanced Tech.
pros: Seamless design allows for easy wear with any outfit
cons: Correct sizing is difficult to find
Waist band can come apart in machine wash

customer_reviews.title: Super gross!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive this three-pack because I've been looking for underwear to wear on long backpacking expeditions and/or during sweaty workouts. Unfortunately, when I opened the "sealed" package, one of the pairs was very, VERY clearly used (I'll let you imagine what that means), which is disgusting. Shame on the person who returned the pair and for Amazon or whomever is in charge of quality control re: repackaging/selling. Obviously I can't speak to whether these things worked or not because I went nowhere near trying them on. I was going to upload a photo but thought I'd spare everyone the ew factor. Triple gross!
customer_reviews.author: apb

customer_reviews.title: Best high waisted work our undies!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these high waisted wicking undies. I feel like I have been looking forever for high wasted undies to wear with my high waisted workout pants and hadn’t had any luck until these. They fit great, don’t hug my sides and make that little fat pocket above your undies, lol, and the seems also don’t show through my pants. I know they are a little pricey but they are worth every penny and I have since ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Zana31

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but that’s it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these panties specifically for the gym and for their claims of odor control and moisture wicking which they do not accomplish. I am disappointed that I spent money on special underwear believing in these claims. However, they are actually very comfortable. These are the most comfortable panties I have ever worn that stay in place. They are extremely high rise to the point that they even peak through my high rise yoga pants and definitely my jeans so that’s a little bit annoying. Other than that they are true to size. If you want comfortable panties these are it. If you want gym underwear to fight odor and sweat look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: FLBeachmom

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big fan of these undies. Pros: I originally purchased them for a trip that required me to bring something easily handwashable and fast drying and these definitely did the job very well. Good for camping or any outdoorsy trip. The fit is very comfortable. True to size. Comfortable, fabric feels similar to moisture wicking fabric. Cons: A little too high waisted. Not a big problem for myself but if you tend to wear lots of low rise pants/bottoms it will probably peek out a little too much. But if you’re like myself and you almost only wear high waisted things, it should not be a problem for you at all.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic underwear for realistically-sized women.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE UNDERWEAR. They have quite a bit of stretch, but not too much. They fit perfectly, and are comfortable enough for me to forget that I'm wearing them. They might feel a bit loose if you do high-impact exercise, so if you get these for crossfit or running, order a size smaller. The specific problem I solved with these was how wide the crotch material is- most thongs have a teeny width across the crotch, which leaves some of us without enough coverage. These COVER IT. Great buy, and will continue to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: I really like them! I'm 6'2''
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man who was looking for an active wear thong with breathable material. There do not seem to be any options specifically for men, so I decided to give these a try. I really like them! I'm 6'2'', 160 lbs., and my hips measure approximately 36.5''. I ordered a large, and I'm quite pleased with the fit and function. These thongs adequately keep my manhood contained, and the back is not abrasive at all. I've run several miles in these already, and have washed them as many times, and the thongs are holding up well. I do not advise running very far with these on, though they're great for 30 minute to 1 hour workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Thong!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT for those men who like to wear comfortable underwear! Everything fits it well with the stretchy fabric, thong feels great to wear and is low rising. Many will find it weird or unusual that a guy likes to wear womens underwear, I find that it feels much better and feels 'right' for me. Do want you like, nevermind what others think. Highly recommend these for ANYONE.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Fits good, color bleeds
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit, but of the colors I bought, the bright pink one has bled in the wash staining my clothes, even after numerous washes - have to hand wash now and it still bleeds. (Photo from 8 months after purchase)
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Coggshall

customer_reviews.title: High waisted and runs big
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’5 and weigh 135. I ordered the large. The material is exactly what I was looking for-soft microfiber. They wash nice. I think the fit was slightly too big and definitely too high waisted. Two photos with Balance Tech on the bottom of each photo. The navy pair is Avia size large which fit me better. The red pair is Body by Victoria also a size large and a better fit. You can see from the photos the Balance Tech are bigger and higher waisted. Maybe go with smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: much better than cotton for working out!
customer_reviews.text: They work well and are so much more pleasant that working out in regular undies. My only complaint is they are SUPER high-waisted. If you don't have a large pooch or don't wear high-waisted workout clothing you may want to consider something else. I have a couple of pants that are high waisted so it works, and for the ones that aren't the bit of extra fabric isn't really a bother. I an 5'6 wiegh 160 lbs (big booty :) and the Ms are great.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for men
customer_reviews.text: As a guy I was unsure how this product would fit, but it fits as well if not better than a lot of men’s underwear I’ve worn. The fabric is soft, breathable and stretchy, making for a snug fit that covers everything appropriately and yet feels like wearing almost nothing. Sides/back can be pulled further up for a more curvy/sexy feel or worn lower to avoid peeking out from behind one’s pants. Comes in cute and soft colors like lilac, as well as sleek ones like black. In practice a great unisex item great for both everyday comfort and an active lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best underwear ever
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my 3rd package of these. They are comfortable and hold up very well to multiple washings. I wear them every day and always feel confident in them. The fabric is not thin or flimsy and I feel like they give me a little tummy support. I am 5'4" and 125 pds and always order a size large because I like them to rise just a little higher. The fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kristaleb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect high-waisted cotton stretch thong
customer_reviews.text: For anyone tall like me at 5'10" I was super frustrated at not being able to find a cotton thong that breathes to wear under my fitness capri's. Either they barely made it past my pubic area and left an indentation along my hips, or didn't stretch at all and I was constantly pulling them up. Not these - perfect stretch, breathable and no tugging. I will be ordering in bulk!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine O

customer_reviews.title: Good for moisture wicking, runs a bit small but stretchy.
customer_reviews.text: These underwear were recommended to me by a coworker. They do run a bit small, I typically wear a large and bought a large and they fit because they are super stretchy but I probably would be better off with an XL at my current weight (quarantine chub problems). My main issue is that the sides roll down a lot which is annoying. Otherwise they’re pretty nice and they do a good job of wicking moisture like they’re supposed to. If you’re gonna be in a hot sweaty environment, they will help you avoid the dreaded “swamp crotch.”
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Order a Size Up
customer_reviews.text: Despite all my underwear being a Large (7,) these squeezed enough to give a pretty bad muffin top...in a form of underwear that's supposed to make that pretty much impossible. (I'm about 150 with a 28" waist and 42" hips.) Also, I blame myself for not reading the description thoroughly, but while these are NOT seamless, they're made of that weird microfiber-y fabric they use for a lot of these "seamless" underwear, which I can't stand. These got returned; hope you have better luck!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gray

customer_reviews.title: Well made, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, and better made than several I have tried on Amazon. When the ones I have worn for years were discontinued, I bought every pair they had on the close out. They are starting to wear out now, so I have been trying anything that looks close to what I like. These are the closest I have found to what I like. I do not feel like I am wearing any underwear with these. I have only washed them a few times, so not sure how they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Cin

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected...
customer_reviews.text: Contrary to what most others wrote, I found the panties to be smaller than I expected. Based on the reviews stating that the panties were on the large side, I ordered "large" instead of "XL" and they are so small that they are just barely wearable. If it wasn't for the fact that they have to be returned "unworn" -- which precludes trying them on -- I would return them for the next larger size. They do seem to be well-made and I like the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Lefty

customer_reviews.title: Much debate here on these fitting men - yes!
customer_reviews.text: After many years of trying a wide array of men's underwear I've very comfortably settled with Balanced Tech. The material in the front is of adequate size and elasticity to comfortably accommodate the male genitalia. I can confidently sit down or cross my legs without the pinching and binding of all the men's underwear I've tried. Short and sweet, these keep everything in place. The size chart here was good as it showed my 34 hips taking size small. The medium's fit just as good because 34 is on the dividing line. I stocked up in the event these are phased out by the controlling factions.
customer_reviews.author: David K

customer_reviews.title: Pre HRT MTF
customer_reviews.text: Received today i read the reviews left by others so decided to take a shot. I work out at home. Im a bit on the bigger side but mostly because i cant stand traing dressed as a male. Anyway i bought the all black 3 pack to go under my yoga shorts for all the cis males i can vouche it can and will hold in the boy parts. However if your 6+ with big "assesories" maybe not. I ran/walked for 2.11 miles per the training program im doing. Happy to report everything stayed in place and no rubbing or chaffing. Will buy again these have turned me into a thong gurl!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: These fit absolutely perfectly the fabric is not too heavy or thin, breathe well and wick moisture in warm weather. Have the right amount of stretch to be supportive and so they stay in place under skinny jeans. Really like the color assortment too - colors in pictures are accurate. This is an excellent fitting and comfortable thong for men.
customer_reviews.author: zephyr1

customer_reviews.title: The large is too big...
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I listened to other people and ordered a large in these, I am 5'5" and a size 12. I'm not fat, I play rugby and have big legs. That being said the large is HUGE and I should have ordered mediums.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newbies and no panty lines
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected and was actually very comfortable. This was my first time wearing a thong and it was quite comfortable and easy to settle into. They came as expected and fit nicely. I got them for my leggings because I was so sick of panty lines and trying to get seamless underwear to work. Finally I thought I should try these. Worked perfect and are not noticeable. I will say they can ride a bit high but I wear high waisted clothing so it isn’t an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Aylin Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect😁🌻🍃
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried them all!! This is one of the best thongs out there!! Honestly, if your looking for a solid yet breathable thong that fits amazing (wider crotch, so they don’t ride, move around etc. And finally,, they are high cut and fit perfect across the tummy, no muffin top, no gapping, a perfect fit!! I’m 5’2, 120lbs. and the Medium is perfect, not too tight and not loose, just right!! Hope this helps someone that is extremely tired of looking, look no more😁🌻🍃
customer_reviews.author: LavenderGypsy

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of room
customer_reviews.text: Straight Male 36 waist I got the L and XL both fit good but the XL will show off a bit of a whale tail, not great for some perfect for others (what ever floats your boat). These are very comfortable being very stretchy and having just the right amount of room up front for guys. Any men out shopping for underwear that's better than the chaffing boxer briefs should try a pair of these. It will only take a few times of wearing them to get used to the back side and then you will be hooked. There's nothing better for working out or running than these.
customer_reviews.author: T R

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, a bit high wasted and larger
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable moisture wicking thong. Doesn't not tug or bind and is quite stretchy. It does run a bit large as most have stated and quite high wasted. Normally wear a large (for comfort) and a small fit just fine. Ended up buying a second set, medium this time, to have just a bit more wiggle room. They are pretty good under yoga pants. The seams are a bit thick so they can show through but my husband likes it. Can't speak for durability since they are so new. But as with all undies I wash in a garment bag and air dry. Would completely recommend and will likely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: frugal shopper

customer_reviews.title: 80s style fit in plastic fabric
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Almost double the price from a microfiber/bamboo sports thong I wanted to buy more off, when they were out... stumbled upon this UA version but this fabric is not at all soft and cool to the touch as what I was hoping for. The design is made for a roller skates girl from the eighties, I feel I should wear legwarmers to the gym to complete the style! The cut is so high up (hits my belly button) that I am afraid my thongs peak out of my leggings... Worse than a plumber crack in my humble opinion.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Great thongs
customer_reviews.text: I got a pack in the small and a pack in the extra small. The small fits great but kind of higher waisted so I get paranoid that it's sticking out of my medium waisted compression shorts. I ordered an extra small as well, and they don't stick out my shorts for sure, but definitely a bit tight. I'm 5'3" and 112 pounds with an athletic build. I'd probably stick with the smalls in the future, but I'm still wearing the extra smalls for the medium waist compression shorts.
customer_reviews.author: husbandandwife

customer_reviews.title: Great for guys!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a guy who wears panties. I'm not a full blown crossdresser. I just love women's underwear because they feel nicer. These are a great example of that. I was hesitant to try out thongs, but I was SO glad I made this purchase because they are the only thongs I have and the only I will ever need!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Pretty high waisted...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small (normally a size XS or 2 in clothing) and the undies fit fine around the waist, but they are very high waisted. I have a few pairs of running tights and shorts that sit lower on the hip, and the rise on these undies makes them visible. They seem pretty sweat wicking and I do prefer them on my long runs to regular undies. I probably would not purchase again though
customer_reviews.author: SD Runner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sports activities
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for working out or wearing under jeans. These fit nice & don’t aggravate my tush like some do- no crawling here! The colors are super bright and the completed look is boyfriend approved!! These have never aggravated me during any of my activities - training horses, martial arts, fixing cars... they're comfy all day long.
customer_reviews.author: AntArf

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and fabric. Perfect rise as the come 1/2 inch under my belly button which is where I want them to lay. Looked for thongs exactly like this for a long time and these are perfect. They don’t roll and they are wide enough at the crotch to cover everything. I’m 5’8 150lbs and I ordered a M
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Smith

customer_reviews.title: SO BIG
customer_reviews.text: Im an average sized person, I typically wear a small and sometimes a medium. I could tell in the package these are bigger than any other underwear I have ever purchased but I tried them on anyway... The waist came up to my belly button!! Around my waist fits okay, but the height of these underwear is like something straight out of the 80s and NOT what appears on the model for advertisement. The material overall seems decent and what you paid for, but the length is so large to an extreme I will never be able to wear these. I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Good for working out in but not a whole day.
customer_reviews.text: The good- These are well priced for athletic wear. I've washed them several times now and they still look new. The construction feels like good quality. I like the colors and the logos look appropriately sporty. The cut is mid-rise which works for my running shorts and the waistband is snug but not too tight. They are comfortable to workout in for max 2 hrs. The meh- They aren't very comfortable for day wear. I tried wearing them to work once and found myself having to adjust periodically. The thick seams also start to rub after a while. Overall I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DecaffeinatedAnonymous

customer_reviews.title: really comfortable. Probably the most comfortable thong I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in nude to wear with gym leggings. They're really, really comfortable. Probably the most comfortable thong I've ever worn. They sit just above my hip bones, probably an inch below my belly button, which works great when you're being active. They're pretty unattractive on, though. My boyfriend saw me in them and giggled, if that tells you anything. Maybe they're cuter when they have some color. But yeah... I wouldn't want anyone to see me in them. Other than that, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Slightly large, but so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 10", 185 lbs. I have some large and some XL underwear, mostly from Walmart. They both fit, but I am usually more comfortable in the XL so that's what I ordered. They fit, but they are a little larger than expected. They come all the way up to my belly button or higher. They are very stretchy so if I avoid stretching them at all and push them down they sit closer to where I would prefer them. Quality and comfort are awesome! They are great for working out. I will be ordering more in size large.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: Epic whale tail!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after reading reviews that they are comparable to my favorite (now discontinued) Under Armour pure stretch thongs, but I have to disagree. These are HUGE! They sit well above the waist of my pants and shorts, they even sit well above my high waisted leggings! I bought a medium, as that's my recommended size, and won't bother trying a smaller size because I don't believe in sending back underwear after trying them on and now I'm stuck with 3 of these granny thongs.
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: ... unraveling thread and did purchase a size smaller as recommended. They're perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one set after reading the reviews about unraveling thread and did purchase a size smaller as recommended. They're perfect! I now have 3 sets. Fuller coverage is good support for hiking and running without showing panty lines. I never put my lingerie in the dryer. I wash them in zippered laundry bags using woolite and hang them to dry so only lost one thong to unraveling thread. It didn't turn into a ball of thread. I continued to use it until I got curious to see what would happen if I kept pulling the thread. I was like a kitten with a ball of yarn! I'm going to buy more of the other colors to match my bras.
customer_reviews.author: Nomi

customer_reviews.title: A Man's Choice
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to offer support and soften the lines under my yoga compression shorts and my board shorts for swimming. I love the fit, support and color choices. The wide waistband is very comfortable and look more like shorts then a thong if your shorts slip a little during Yoga. Men's thongs are 2 to 3 times the price. And the pouch design offers minimal support.
customer_reviews.author: Brice Walnut Creek

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for workouts.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium (I am 5’6, 150lbs, hips 40”) and they’re snug, but feel very comfortable. I would definitely not want to size up. I wear them on long cycling rides and they feel great (no pinching, no nothing) and they’re invisible underneath my yoga pants. Also washed and tumble dried low, and came out great.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Pelow

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am totally hooked on these undies. I found them at a dept store by accident, and thought i would give them i try. Loved them. Went to gey more and they were no where to b seen. I couldnt b happier when i found them on amazon. I love the higher rise. They pull in the little pooch when im wearing something tight and feel great. Ladies try them. I used to buy ones similar at victorias secret for sooooo much more $.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle L.

customer_reviews.title: These panties run very big!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these, but they were huge. I usually wear a small, but these were falling off even over another pair of panties. The material felt nice, but the fit was terrible. I would not recommend these for women that normally wear a small, I can’t comment for other size, though I assume these just run big.
customer_reviews.author: NIC

customer_reviews.title: I only want to wear these from now on!
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favorite! Bought them for a week long backpacking trip and now I just want you wear them every day! They are very comfortable, do not dig into your sides! They really are made for an athletic body. Plenty of room front to back (unlike some other "athletic fit" brands i have tried). They quick moisture phenomenally and don't get the funk! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: These are great to work out in as they do pull the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great to work out in as they do pull the sweat away from your body. The fit is a little on the large side and I'd prefer a little lower rise as I can't wear these with lower rise pants but...these are very comfortable and stay in place throughout all of my workouts. As some of the other reviews state however, 2 of the 6 that I ordered fell apart after about 3 washes. Just unraveled and had to throw them away. Really like the ones that didn't fall apart though.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and fit better than expected
customer_reviews.text: These were super comfortable and fit much better than I thought they would. When I first opened them, I thought they’d be low waisted, but they sit mid hip and stay put when I stretch them more to sit high waisted. They even stay put when I move around. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Best thong for Males
customer_reviews.text: Male who wears thongs due to comfort and beats boxer or boxer briefs. These fit males as well perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Playful throughout the day.
customer_reviews.text: These thong panties are very stretchy in a good way like nothing I have experienced before. You can wear the elastic band above or below the hip throughout the day and they will stay in place without straining the material. The good part is you forget you are wearing them unless you want to play and move them in a different position.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sahara

customer_reviews.title: These are great for a more reasonable option for workout underwear and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a more reasonable option for workout underwear and they are very comfortable but if you are used to Under Armour brand or have not tried those, they are definitely more expensive but they are a better option if you're planning on something that's comfortable and breathable for a workout. There is absolutely nothing wrong with these ones, I just don't think they are as comfortable as the Under Armour ones. But for the price, these are definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Same threading issue, but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same issue as many other reviewers with the threading coming out after a wash and dry. I just cut the threads, and they seem okay. I really do want to like these undies. They've been great to wear with leggings because the lines don't show. They were a bit smaller than I expected, although they do stretch out after you put them on. The material is pretty good. It doesn't hold in sweat or smell even after working out as much as other undies do. If it wasn't for the threading issue, it would get 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jasi

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down
customer_reviews.text: I wear a medium in almost everything (I’m a size 6). These were much too large. Or they are a much higher rise than I prefer. (They’d be outside my jeans, which is not an attractive look in 2018.) Cotton is the recommended material for underwear, so just know that these don’t qualify. I’m not sure why I thought they were cotton, but they’re not. That one is on me though.
customer_reviews.author: moneywrench76

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel.
customer_reviews.text: This underwear is fantastic. The moisture wicking is amazing. They fit a touch small though. I am usually between a medium and large most places, so I ordered a large and they still feel kind of small. I will probably order XL if I ever need more.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Alison

customer_reviews.title: stays in place!
customer_reviews.text: These were mentioned on a YouTube video I watched and I decided to give them a try. The crotch area is the perfect size to where there's no shifting or pulling throughout the day, and the waistband doesn't fold, sag or dig in. These actually stay in place!!! I've worn these to the gym and they were by far the most comfortable I've ever worn! They weren't as moisture wicking as I had hoped, BUT I sweat more than most so maybe that's just a me problem! I definitely recommended these to some friends and I will be ordering more soon!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Good for working out
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty happy with the material and quality of these undies. I use them for working out and so far they have been mostly comfortable and or I forget I have them on. I've washed/dried them and they have held up good. I have escaped the dreaded panty line with these under my workout leggings. I wish there was some cotton in the material to make them a little more comfortable as I am a sensitive skin type, but again I'm happy with them. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kbear

customer_reviews.title: COMFY
customer_reviews.text: Comfy comfy comfy! Wore these under my leggings while hiking and didn't even notice I was wearing anything. The colors are super cute and the cut is great - wide enough for coverage without digging in. They do run a little large so I'd recommend sizing down. All in all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Morey

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the pairs stretched out shortly after purchasing. They were too large when I got them as well, so only the 1 is wearable for me. If I had ordered a smaller size they may have still been usable. My theory is that I washed the one in hot water and dried it, re-shrinking it to size. Other than that, the 1 is comfortable and has good coverage in the front. I'd order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Ruda

customer_reviews.title: Cut out two inches of material!
customer_reviews.text: These fit fine in the waist but you have to wear them practically above your belly button just to get the material to sit comfortably. WAYYY too much material in the back, need to cut out at least two inches. I like that they are thick but don't like that they stick 6 inches out of my pants just to sit where they are supposed to sit!! I tried to fold the top over and they fit better, but then had a bulky line all around my hips. Bleh!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Between running around at work and exercising after work, I sweat... A LOT! Especially down there. And with sweating comes odor. These are the ONLY underwear I have found that keep me dry ALL day!! I wear from 6 am in the morning until 7 or 8 at night and they are still dry when I take them off to shower. I will only be buying these from now on!!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality athletic thing
customer_reviews.text: I like this and think they’re good quality. Love the bright colors. I wish the cut was a little different on them as they kind of dig in an unflattering way, but I got them for sports and running, so it doesn’t really matter. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Whitnee

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable work out thong made!
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the most comfortable sports thong underwear ever made! Its so hard to find a pair that stays put if you are small framed. Also, any hip hugger or cheeky bottom shows and thats just not ok! If you find a thong most of the time they creep down over the hips or ride up in the front. These stay put! Plus, they have a tone of stretch so they give with you while you work out.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Hart

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart after just a few washings
customer_reviews.text: I bought these thongs in preparation for a backpacking trip. At first, I loved them. They fit well and they wicked the sweat away, which is important during multi-day backpacking trips in the summer. However, after just a few washings the thread in the waistband unraveled completely on every pair. In fact. the final pair unraveled while in the washing machine and made complete hornet's nest of thread. I'm very disappointed and, at this point, am frustrated that I cannot get a refund on these items.
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and more importantly is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and is comfortable which is really important when it comes to a thong. The only downside is out of the 12 pairs I bought about 2-3 started to fray after wash, but even with that I would still order more as I like them that much. I could do without the triangle logo and the words 'balanced" on the waist band, but it is not a deal breaker for me. It would be great if I could just order several in one color as you have to buy a three pack and they all come in different colors. Highly recommend this product for anyone who wears thongs.
customer_reviews.author: QT

customer_reviews.title: Sizing...Wrong
customer_reviews.text: If you choose to purchase this product make sure to SIZE UP! Not the same design as previous thong. The sizing has changed. I order two sets because the previous thong was great...now they are off to Salvation Army.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Shreds very easily.
customer_reviews.text: Found them reasonably comfortable, but I only have one pair left because two out of three pairs completely got destroyed during washing and drying. These were actually two different sets of machines, too, so I don't think it was that. As others reviewers have noted, part of it unraveled and actually pilled/knotted around other items being washed/dried with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jo G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wear panties.
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable. The only thing I don't like is that once in a while the waistband rolls in front and I have to straighten it out. I did order up one size and am glad I did. Without doing that, I believe the elastic around the top of the thighs would be uncomfortable and the waistband would roll worse than it does.
customer_reviews.author: Joya

customer_reviews.title: Great panties
customer_reviews.text: These panties are really well made. A bit higher rise than I'm used to, which is why I gave it four stars instead of five. However, the fabric is comfortable enough to work out in or wear all day, and though not exactly seamless, the seams are stitched down so there is no irritation. The colors are vibrant, and I love that I can wash them in the machine. I typically wear a size small stretch pant, so I ordered the small, and they fit just right, other than the rise.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Great quality fabric
customer_reviews.text: These are great and comfy! I enjoy wearing these for HIIT workouts and they don't bother me much and stay in place most of the time. Maybe just 1 wedgie pull in 60 mins. I ordered a small and normally am a small, and they do fit a bit looser mostly in the front. Foopa space? lol . It's not really bothersome, and better than being too tight
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I really hate thongs but occasionally the outfit just needs one. So here we are. These are the most comfortable thongs to wear if you have to. And i have tried everything! Even bought a $40 thong claiming to be the holy grail. Nope! These were better. Very soft and stretchy, minimal irritation. Pretty good coverage of your lady bits even as a thong.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Retzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a great option, but the large was too small for me. I’m 5’3” and 145, but the large fit more like a medium. I wear VS large in every thong style, these fit more like their medium, and there is not a lot of stretch which means they will look terrible under leggings..which is what I wear when I workout. Might order another pair, but for now they’re just in the back of the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn Winona

customer_reviews.title: This is tech in a piece of underwear
customer_reviews.text: I am 99cm/38inch hips, this fit like it was made for me, I used them in the gym today, leg day, and it was incredible, no smells, no sweat. is incredible, I'm ordering another package, so worth the price. Top of the line, believe me
customer_reviews.author: julissadantes

customer_reviews.title: My 1st Thong!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a straight man and was hesitant to order these as I wasn't sure how they would hold my package...these are nice and stretchy and hold everything in place just nice. Nice fabric, they feel great and I like they way they feel!
customer_reviews.author: 12 Circles

customer_reviews.title: Man these are comfy, and I'm a dude
customer_reviews.text: I am a pretty big guy and I love wearing thongs when I run. These fit pretty well, but you may have to adjust them a little (pull them down) to get everything to fit.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sweat and hard work
customer_reviews.text: I weld as one of my jobs in West Texas. Which means being in constant sweat during spring, summer and fall These are comfortable and keep me from being chafed. They don’t move around as some do when I’m drenched in sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Keavy L Jones

customer_reviews.title: THE PERFECT THONG!
customer_reviews.text: Imagine my terror when I discovered my fave thongs were no longer on the market? Panic ensued! Then, I found the Balanced Tech thongs. Honestly, I like them better than what I had been wearing! Comfortable and appear to be very well made. I can't report on longevity yet, but so far I have nothing to say buy high praise for their comfort. These are no flimsy little things that wedge in the wrong place. I put them on and frankly, I don't think about them the rest of the day -- that is exactly how undergarments shoudl work!
customer_reviews.author: Bugs4Cy

customer_reviews.title: The best  thong for working out
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of these both in the style as well as the bikini style and for working out there are absolutely amazing or going on a hike it really keeps everything dry and healthier in that area
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I'm totally hooked!
customer_reviews.text: When my "old favorite" style thongs, got discontinued, I went on a mission to find a new favorite. I searched, and searched some more, and found these! Lucky me! I read 6-8 pages of reviews, and I ordered just one pack of 3. What could I lose? I'm 5' tall, and weigh about 145 lbs, and normally wear a size 6 or 8 in pants. I read that these do run "large" so I ordered a MEDIUM, and they fit so well, and are SO comfortable, and you never realize that you're wearing them? Went back online and ordered 2 more packages. That must tell you something!
customer_reviews.author: HBS

customer_reviews.title: A+ comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my second buy of this product. These last, and are super comfortable. I love that they have pretty full coverage in the front. Mind you, I would order a size down. I usually wear smalls, but the extra smalls fit better.
customer_reviews.author: Ruda

customer_reviews.title: Breathable, soft and fairly durable
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two three-packs of this brand in medium. I wear a women's size 8-9 in jeans and am 5'6". They fit snugly and do not ride up. Quality is pretty good, I only had one pair unravel in the washing machine. Colors are good and don't bleed at all. Material is breathable and soft. I prefer other brands for everyday wear but these are great for workouts and are an affordable alternative to other brands. Only complaint is that they dig in slightly since I shrunk them a bit in the dryer. Would recommend hang drying.
customer_reviews.author: Alle

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These panties are wonderful. They fit perfect, feel very light. Some of the reviews stated they fall apart when washing. I have not had a problem with that. I just toss them in the washer & dryer with everything else, no special care, and they come out perfect every time. I love them so much I have ordered 12 pairs. I have worn Victoria's Secret for years and I really think these are more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: C.A. Riley

customer_reviews.title: No Panty Lines
customer_reviews.text: You will never worry about panty lines when you wear these Balanced Tech thongs because the rear elastic does not pass across the buttocks as with traditional panties and so create lines beneath some fabrics but rather passes between them, a recessed route that is far less visible through the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Stith

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you sweat in undesirable places
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase of 2020 I have big thighs and sweat in undesirable regions and when I say sweat I mean it feels like I had an accident these undies are my best find since I’ve had amazon only down side is panty protectors do not stick as well but a tampon and your good I also did 10 miles on the trail and did not sweat at all 💕💕💕
customer_reviews.author: Josephine Noami Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, somewhat quick dry
customer_reviews.text: These are great, really comfortable and durable. Went through 7 months of backpacking around the world including 4 rough months in India. They survived many washes and luckily haven't snagged like others have mentioned. They're not amazingly quick dry though, on par with most sporty stuff of same weight. Lacy underwear still dries faster.
customer_reviews.author: Buttons

customer_reviews.title: Better than Victoria’s Secret!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying Victoria’s Secret thongs for years. When I saw these on Amazon I went out on a whim and bought a pack... now I have 5 packs! These are amazing! Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: awkward fit
customer_reviews.text: As suggested in reviews I ordered one size up. They are way too big and fit very strangely. These ride up over my workout leggings all the time and are a hassle to wear at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Second time buying these
customer_reviews.text: So I have a love/hate relationship with these. I love that they are so comfortable, but I hate how they start to unravel and material strarts to come undone arun waist. It could be from the dryer, but I think it's just the material. So if you buy them maybe hang dry? They did fit me just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lorilu

customer_reviews.title: These underwear are great..
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are great....until washed. Mine were washed in my nice washer w/o the spinner and they fell completely apart. I even went against my gut after reading other reviews, thinking maybe the people writing them were just crazy. I was wrong. I would not buy again. I liked them so much before I washed them I ordered more, I will be returning both sets.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Great under leggings
customer_reviews.text: Fit TTS, very comfortable. Great color selection. I wear an 8 in pants, 29 waist, 41 hips, bought size large They go up fairly high, but not above the waistband. I bought them for workout leggings and they don't really show underneath
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out, IMO runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for work out underwear that I could wear with my leggings that would not leave the dreaded "panty line". These are an amazing product I that they stay dry, and the colors are amazing. I am only giving 4 stars for the sizing. I am normally a small, and they are a tad too big and I find myself hiking them up frequently while working out. I will definitely purchase again, but will size down next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Sabo

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, but hips/waist cut is too high.
customer_reviews.text: Hate to be in the minority here. I've used these for about a month now for solely working out (everything from high impact running, to training to weightlifting etc) and they just don't fit as well as I would like. The main problem is the waist is cut too high, if I wore it normally the sides of the thong would be sticking up outside the sides of my pants/tights, so I end up having to tuck them in. I'm 5'5 130lbs, so not bony skinny at all. I assume for larger hipped people this would work better but it sadly didn't for me. They've however handled numerous machine and hand-washing cycles just fine, the material is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Js

customer_reviews.title: 90's Jamie Lee Curtis hips! XD
customer_reviews.text: 40" hips. These are almost waist high on me, if I try to wear them at the hip, the crotch material dangles a mile. But they served their purpose. Fits like a dance thong, not a hip level one.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Just one thing.
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo... The fabric and overall product quality are great, they don't chafe or stretch out during the day. The reason it's not getting five stars is because these are not your every day underwear, unless you like your underwear half way up your midsection. Luckily I don't mind wearing them to the gym since most gym pants are also made to fit a liiiiittle high nowdays. I suppose they would also work nicely with a dress or a pencil skirt.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size, a little large.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a medium in underwear. Ordered these in a medium and they fit great at first, but after the first wash and dry, every time I would wear them, they would stretch out a bit too much. I would recommend buying THESE maybe a size smaller. I wear them to workout. I have bought other underwear from this company, that has straps on the sides, and those are more true to size.
customer_reviews.author: ChicChicagoGal

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!! I have searched high and low for ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect!! I have searched high and low for comfortable thongs that stay put AND provide comfortable coverage where comfortable coverage is needed. I received my order yesterday, tried them on, wore them for a while, then went back in and placed an order for 3 more sets. I HIGHLY recommend these if you're looking for quality and comfort. HOWEVER, BE ADVISED THAT THE HOT PINK BLEEDS IN THE WASHER REGARDLESS OF THE TEMPERATURE AND CYCLE. IT BLEEDS ONTO CLOTHES, AND THE MACHINE ITSELF.
customer_reviews.author: C. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Extreme comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These are without a doubt the best pair of thongs I have ever bought, they are extremely comfortable and you absolutely feel like you have nothing on at all. The 4-way stretch material conforms to your body very nicely so the thongs aren't too loose and they're not too tight. I would highly recommend these thongs for anybody who is the least bit active on the job or at Play, you won't regret buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous3238

customer_reviews.title: and am very pleased with how quickly they dry when hand or machine ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for travel purposes, and am very pleased with how quickly they dry when hand or machine washed. The color on the light pink one faded very quickly into a dingy, unattractive color, and within 2 months, the bright pink pair had somehow shed a legitimate handful of stretchy pink fibers. I have no idea how they're still in one piece, but I am disappointed in the fraying around the seams. Still using them 10 months later, but I'm over it. They are also quite high cut, which, combined with the stretchy fabric, makes these ideal for an 80s throwback spandex workout costume.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: I’m sticking with commando
customer_reviews.text: I’m a thong wearer normally, but it really was uncomfortable to wear these while working out. (I was constantly picking them from my rear.) Maybe any other tech thong would be the same way, but I won’t be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: HJS

customer_reviews.title: Different sizes?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 3 pack with black, nude, and light gray in large. I got these to wear at the gym under leggings to prevent panty-lines. I wore the black pair first, and loved them. They fit great and didn't move at all while at the gym. It was a while later before trying the nude pair. I noticed they fit differently, but still wore them. They are way bigger than the black pair even though they are the same size! They look weird on me and go up much higher. I'm not sure if I just got a weird pair or what! The gray pair seems to fit like the black pair though.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: As comfy as all the other BT thongs I own!  These folks have the proportions, finish, and material of their underwear perfected.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE BT thongs. Just expanding my collection. If you're wondering about the perfect thong for daily wear, you can stop looking. Just buy the BT catalogue and you'll be set! :)
customer_reviews.author: Try_Anything

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for work outs!
customer_reviews.text: Great undies for workouts! Thick material is great quality and will last through harsh work outs, running, and washes for time to come. The undies fit high on the waist (nearly at my belly button) and the thong is full coverage in the front and comfortable to move around in. True to size with great stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Z.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Washed before wearing and 2 pair came apart around the waist and had to go straight to trash. After several more washes 4 of 12 so far are now in the trash. The waistband comes apart too easily, choose another product. The ones that are still intact are great though, but only a matter of time...
customer_reviews.author: Michele Y Graeber

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Fit
customer_reviews.text: I purchased briefs in this same brand and they fit perfectly. The measurements for these thongs is totally wrong. The waist is tight and gives me a muffin top look and the thong fabric is way too long making you have to pull these very high up on your waist for them to even feel right. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: M Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Tried the male thong thing per other comments; Size small didn't for me, but they fit my wife just fine.
customer_reviews.text: I was following the reviews from other guys, and was planning to keep them for myself, so I ordered a set. I usually wear pants with a 30 waist, so ordered a small. The small ones fit me, but didn't quite have enough room in the front. If I was a size medium or large waist, I imagine there would be enough stretch; No big deal; I gave them to my wife and they fit her just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

product_meta.title: Balanced Tech Women's Wicking Performance Seamless Thong Panties 3-Pack Underwear
product_meta.description:
This 3 Pack seamless Thongs From Balanced Tech is made from lightweight 92% Nylon/8% Elastane or 60%Polyester/36%Nylon/4%elastane fabric that's super soft and comfortable and provides anti-odor and Breathability that moves moisture away from the body and QUICK DRY moisture control technology ensures fast drying, Four-Way Stretch conforms to the body for excellent support, plus the Seamless-style underwear to ensure Comfort While minimizing visible panty lines. Now Reinforced for longer lasting Comfort and durability. This economical 3-pack is a smart investment for any woman's active attire collection. 

About the Brand - "Balanced Tech" is an activewear brand that infuses technology, Driven by the latest trends with style and comfort for everyday goals and challenges. Whether you are working up a serious sweat or hanging out on a Sunday, you can always look and feel great with Balanced Tech!
feature_bullets: New Reinforced construction for longer lasting Comfort and durability for these super comfort seamless thongs panties underwear
Tag-less labeling and no seam design eliminates chafing while minimizing no show panty lines, features full coverage
Quick dry, Wash on the Go with these and breathable athletic briefs, ensures fast drying perfect for traveling and active lifestyle
Odor resistance and Moisture wicking performance technology, keeps you fresh and feeling dry throughout your day
Stay in place 4 way stretch ultra-comfortable nylon elastane fabric allows for freedom of movement and conforms to the body for great support
